actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the purposes of carrying out the activities of the State Justice Institute for fiscal years 1997, 1998, 1999, and 2000, and for other purposes.
short_title: State Justice Institute Reauthorization Act of 1996

summary.text: State Justice Institute Reauthorization Act of 1996 - Amends the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 to authorize appropriations through FY 2000. Requires meetings of the executive committee of the Institute's Board of Directors to be open meetings only on those occasions on which the committee has been delegated the authority to act on behalf of the Board. Repeals reporting requirements of the Attorney General with respect to the effectiveness of the Institute.

titles.title: State Justice Institute Reauthorization Act of 1996
A bill to authorize appropriations for the purposes of carrying out the activities of the State Justice Institute for fiscal years 1997, 1998, 1999, and 2000, and for other purposes.
